quotes.quote: Don't take life too seriously. You'll never get out of it alive.
Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter
I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
There are worse things in life than death. Have you ever spent an evening with an insurance salesman?
Age is of no importance unless you're a cheese.
Be nice to people on your way up because you meet them on your way down.
Life is like a roll of toilet paper; hopefully long and useful, but it always ends at the wrong moment.
Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
If A is success in life, then A is equal to X plus Y plus Z. Work is X; Y is play; and Z - keeping your mouth shut.
You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake
You are only young once, but you can be immature forever.
Life is funny, when you are young you want to be older and those that are older wish to be younger.
Lead us not into temptation. Just tell us where it is; we'll find it.
Do not argue with an idiot. He will drag you down to his level and beat you with experience
You may not always end up where you thought you were going, But you will always end up where you were meant to be.
Before you judge a man, walk a mile in his shoes. After that who cares? He's a mile away and you've got his shoes!
The elevator to success is out of order. You'll have to use the stairs...one step at a time.
I never made a mistake in my life. I thought I did once, but I was wrong.
Everyone has a sense of humor. If you don't laugh at jokes, you probably laugh at opinions.
My psychiatrist told me I was crazy and I said I want a second opinion. He said okay, you're ugly too
If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.
The hardest thing in the world to understand is the income tax.
Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
People will laugh at anything, except their own moronic self.
Tolerance! The virtue that makes one bite his tongue so that he can tear out his hair.
The fact that we're all different is the one thing we all have in common.
Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
Stop worrying about the world ending today. It's already tomorrow in Australia.
The first time I sang in the church choir; two hundred people changed their religion
Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Get busy living or get busy dying.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking.
Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one’s destiny to do, and then do it.
In order to write about life first you must live it.
The big lesson in life, baby, is never be scared of anyone or anything.
Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Don’t settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.
Life imposes things on you that you can’t control, but you still have the choice of how you’re going to live through this.
Life is never easy. There is work to be done and obligations to be met – obligations to truth, to justice, and to liberty.
Live for each second without hesitation.
The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
The human race has one really effective weapon, and that is laughter.
I am still determined to be cheerful and happy in whatever situation I find myself.
Blessed is he who makes his companions laugh.
Happy are those who have given up worrying once and for all.
He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has
It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
The happiness of you life depends on the quality of your thoughts.
Mirth, and even cheerfulness, when employed as remedies in low spirits, are like hot water to a frozen limb.
The most wasted of all days is that in which we have not laughed.

Life is like a guided tour, where we are the tourists, our inner voice is the guide and the destiny is like a travel company which tries to give us the best possible 'package' that our 'Karma' can afford!
Life is cruising the ocean while watching a beautiful sunrise.
Life is a meaningless existence unless equality exists for every living soul.
Life is the rustling of leaves as the wind blows. You will experience the true meaning of life once you show appreciation for the simple things God provides daily.

Developing a cheerful disposition can permit an atmosphere wherein one's spirit can be nurtured and encouraged to blossom and bear fruit. Being pessimistic and negative about our experiences will not enhance the quality of our lives. A determination to be of good cheer can help us and those around us to enjoy life more fully.
Life teaches you many lessons, many good, some bad. Just learn from the good and forget the bad.
Life is a succession of moments. To live each one is to succeed.
When we do the best we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.
Do not be afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living and your belief will create the fact.
According to this third important mental law, your outer life is a mirror image to your inner life.

Everything you have in your life today you have attracted to yourself by the person you are, by the way you think. You can change your life because you can change the person you are. You can change your thoughts that you think.
The most important things in life that are free are common sense, knowledge, and opportunities. If you acquire one of the three, the others will fall with in your grasp.
We need to accept that most things in life are beyond our control, but they are generally good.
Even in life, it is wise to find good people and experiences, instead of complaining about the bad ones; while keeping in mind that even the good experiences will not last forever.
The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark.
If you were born without wings, do nothing to prevent them form growing.
If you do not hope, you will not find what is beyond your hopes.
Other times we feel discouraged, drained and spiritually weak and need inspiration and added strength to keep ourselves striving to build the life that we envisioned to continue to move forward.
No on said life was easy - there are always challenges, and hurdles along the way that must be overcome.

And I truly believe that the information, thoughts, ideas and inspiration that we feed our mind, soul and spirit with has a direct correlation with the quality and ultimately the direction of our life's unfolding.
Having children gives your life purpose. Right now my purpose is to get some sleep.
To me old age is always fifteen year older than I am.
By the time you're eighty years old you've learned everything. You only have to remember it.
I was introduced to a beautiful young lady as a man in his nineties. Early nineties, I insisted.
I don't know how you feel about old age, but in my case I didn't even see it coming. It hit me from the rear.
I'm at the age when my back goes out more than I do.
Eighty is a wonderful age - especially if you're ninety.
An elderly woman in a nursing home declined her pastor's suggestion that she get a hearing aid. 'At 91, I've hear enough,' she said.
In youth we want to change the world. In old age we want to change youth.
I'm now old enough to personally identify every object in antique stores.
Forty is the old age of youth; fifty is the youth of old age.
Children are a great comfort in your old age-and they help you reach it faster too.
Oh to be old again,' said a young corpse.
